00019 #ifndef _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_QUEUE_H
00020 #define _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_QUEUE_H
00021 
00022 #include <stdint.h>
00023 #include <alchemy/timer.h>
00024 
00025 /*
00026  * Creation flags.
00027  */
00028 #define Q_PRIO  0x1     /* Pend by task priority order. */
00029 #define Q_FIFO  0x0     /* Pend by FIFO order. */
00030 /* Deprecated, compat only. */
00031 #define Q_SHARED 0x0
00032 
00033 #define Q_UNLIMITED 0   /* No size limit. */
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * Operation flags.
00037  */
00038 #define Q_NORMAL     0x0
00039 #define Q_URGENT     0x1
00040 #define Q_BROADCAST  0x2
00041 
00042 struct RT_QUEUE {
00043         uintptr_t handle;
00044 };
00045 
00046 typedef struct RT_QUEUE RT_QUEUE;
00047 
00048 struct RT_QUEUE_INFO {
00049         int nwaiters;
00050         int nmessages;
00051         int mode;
00052         size_t qlimit;
00053         size_t poolsize;
00054         size_t usedmem;
00055         char name[32];
00056 };
00057 
00058 typedef struct RT_QUEUE_INFO RT_QUEUE_INFO;
00059 
00060 #ifdef __cplusplus
00061 extern "C" {
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 int rt_queue_create(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00065                     const char *name,
00066                     size_t poolsize, size_t qlimit, int mode);
00067 
00068 int rt_queue_delete(RT_QUEUE *queue);
00069 
00070 void *rt_queue_alloc(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00071                      size_t size);
00072 
00073 int rt_queue_free(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00074                   void *buf);
00075 
00076 int rt_queue_send(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00077                   const void *buf, size_t size, int mode);
00078 
00079 int rt_queue_write(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00080                    const void *buf, size_t size, int mode);
00081 
00082 ssize_t rt_queue_receive_timed(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00083                                void **bufp,
00084                                const struct timespec *abs_timeout);
00085 
00086 static inline
00087 ssize_t rt_queue_receive_until(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00088                                void **bufp, RTIME timeout)
00089 {
00090         struct timespec ts;
00091         return rt_queue_receive_timed(queue, bufp,
00092                                       alchemy_abs_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00093 }
00094 
00095 static inline
00096 ssize_t rt_queue_receive(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00097                          void **bufp, RTIME timeout)
00098 {
00099         struct timespec ts;
00100         return rt_queue_receive_timed(queue, bufp,
00101                                       alchemy_rel_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00102 }
00103 
00104 ssize_t rt_queue_read_timed(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00105                             void *buf, size_t size,
00106                             const struct timespec *abs_timeout);
00107 
00108 static inline
00109 ssize_t rt_queue_read_until(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00110                             void *buf, size_t size, RTIME timeout)
00111 {
00112         struct timespec ts;
00113         return rt_queue_read_timed(queue, buf, size,
00114                                    alchemy_abs_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00115 }
00116 
00117 static inline
00118 ssize_t rt_queue_read(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00119                       void *buf, size_t size, RTIME timeout)
00120 {
00121         struct timespec ts;
00122         return rt_queue_read_timed(queue, buf, size,
00123                                    alchemy_rel_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00124 }
00125 
00126 int rt_queue_flush(RT_QUEUE *queue);
00127 
00128 int rt_queue_inquire(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00129                      RT_QUEUE_INFO *info);
00130 
00131 int rt_queue_bind(RT_QUEUE *queue,
00132                   const char *name,
00133                   RTIME timeout);
00134 
00135 int rt_queue_unbind(RT_QUEUE *queue);

00137 #ifdef __cplusplus
00138 }
